name: Coal Spark
description: Where Smoky Flavors Meet Indo-Arabian Excellence

address.street: At 1567, Ground Floor, NGR Complex, 27th Main, BTM Layout

signatureDishes.name: BBQ Platter
signatureDishes.description: Smoky, spicy, and grilled to perfection - our signature barbeque platter served with love

signatureDishes.name: Mutton Raan Mandi
signatureDishes.description: Tender mutton served with unlimited rice, excellent Mandi preparation

signatureDishes.name: Chicken Kizhi Parotta
signatureDishes.description: Flaky layered parotta with succulent chicken

signatureDishes.name: Chicken Fried Rice
signatureDishes.description: Best fried rice in Bangalore with basmati rice

signatureDishes.name: Tandoori Chicken
signatureDishes.description: Marinated and grilled to smoky perfection

philosophy: At Coal Spark, we believe in creating legendary barbeque experiences. Every dish is grilled to perfection with a perfect blend of smoky, spicy flavors and Indo-Arabian excellence. Our coals spark up memories that last forever.
experience: Step into our cozy casual dining space where the aroma of freshly grilled meats and spices fills the air. Our warm ambiance and friendly staff create the perfect setting for family gatherings and special celebrations. Generous portions and unbeatable value make Coal Spark your go-to destination.
specialOffers: IPL Special: Win 2 tickets for every match in Bangalore
Iftar Special: Exclusive party menu available
